Twinclaw Rend.name: Twinclaw Rend
Twinclaw Rend.flavor: Both your weapons bite deep, and the scent of fresh blood guides your subsequent blows.
Twinclaw Rend.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Twinclaw Rend.onHit: 2[W] + 1[W] (off-hand weapon) + Strength modifier damage. You gain a +2 power bonus to melee attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Twinclaw Rend.special: You can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Twinclaw Berserker Rage.name: Twinclaw Berserker Rage
Twinclaw Berserker Rage.flavor: You strike at enemies far and wide. Your rage then transforms you into a frenzy of steel.
Twinclaw Berserker Rage.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Twinclaw Berserker Rage.effect: You enter the rage of the twinclaw berserker. Until the rage ends, as the first action of each of your turns, you can deal 2[W] damage (off-hand weapon) to each enemy adjacent to you as a free action.

Dangerous Blur.name: Dangerous Blur
Dangerous Blur.flavor: You whirl your weapons closer to a foe, swearing retribution.
Dangerous Blur.effect: The next attack you make against the triggering enemy before the end of your next turn deals 1[W] extra damage (off-hand weapon).
